author: Staff Reporter
text:
P. Nagarajan assumed office as Deputy Inspector General of Police, Salem Range, here on Tuesday.

He replaces Vidya Jayant Kulkarni, who had been posted as Deputy Inspector General of Police, Crime Branch CID, Chennai, in the existing vacancy. Prior to joining the office, Mr. Nagarajan was the Joint Commissioner of Police (Traffic-South), Greater Chennai Police, Chennai.
title: New DIG assumes office
